title: Compacta Info?
content:
I was wondering if anyone knew where I could find some more information or history on the typeface Compacta? I have found Fred Lambert was the creator but that’s about all I can find. I recently got turned onto this type and I’m digging it so please include any thoughts you have on it, cheers!

-Byron
author: Byronb81

comments.content:
Here's a sample of Compacta Bold

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172859im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CompactaBold_4056.gif)

he was one of letraset's designers, also designed annlie and linear... google books has [American type design & designers By David Consuegra](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414172859/http:/books.google.com/books?id=alglQxkHi-wC&pg=RA4-PT16&lpg=RA4-PT16&dq=type+fred+lambert+letraset&source=bl&ots=A6hKojwSb4&sig=Z_GbUfNZzXgigtxp0ajNHMUILCU&hl=en&ei=lQPXSdXbIoeSjAfB4-CWDQ&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=2#PPA1936,M1) which has some references to him.
